IPW Ungkap 4 Nama Jenderal Bintang 2 yang Berpotensi Jadi Kabareskrim
06 Nov 2019, 15:52 by Audrey Santoso
Jakarta - Indonesia Police Watch (IPW) menyebut ada empat nama jenderal bintang dua (inspektur jenderal atau irjen) yang berpotensi mengisi jabatan Kepala Badan Reserse Kriminal (Kabareskrim) Polri. Siapa saja?
Keempat jenderal itu adalah Kadiv Propam Polri Irjen Listyo Sigit, Kapolda Metro Jaya Irjen Gatot Eddy Pramono, Asisten bidang Operasi (Asops) Kapolri Irjen Martuani Sormin dan Kapolda Sumatera Utara Irjen Agus Andrianto.
"Keempatnya merupakan figur-figur jenderal yang memiliki prestasi masing-masing di tempat tugasnya. Meskipun memilih Kabareskrim adalah hak proregatif Kapolri, namun dalam memilih Kabareskrim yang baru, IPW berharap, Kapolri melihat beberapa aspek," kata Ketua Presidium Ind Police Watch, Neta S Pane, dalam keterangan tertulisnya, Rabu (6/11/2019).
Neta mengatakan ada empat aspek yang perlu diperhatikan dalam memilih sosok Kabareskrim, yaitu senioritas, cermat melihat dinamika internal, berpengalaman sebagai polisi reserse dan dekat dengan pemuka agama Islam. Terkait aspek keempat, menurut Neta, perlu sinergitas antara aparat dan ulama dalam menjaga keamanan dan ketertiban masyarakat (kamtibmas).
"Faktor kedekatan dengan ulama menjadi penting sebab ulama masih dipandang sebagai panutan oleh masyarakat di negeri ini. Situasi ini tentunya bisa bersinergi dalam menjaga stabilitas Kamtibmas. Selain itu adanya isu radikalisme dan dampak ketegangan di era Pilpres 2019 bisa diminimalisasi. Setidaknya, adanya isu kriminalisasi terhadap ulama di sepanjang Pilpres 2019 bisa dinetralisir dan dituntaskan dengan pendekatan-pendekatan kemitraan," ujar Neta.

IPW Reveals 4 Names of General 2 Stars with the Potential to Become Criminal Investigations
Nov 6, 2019, 15:52 by Audrey Santoso
Jakarta - Indonesia Police Watch (IPW) said there are four names of two star generals (inspector general or irjen) who have the potential to fill the position of Chief of the Criminal Investigation Agency (Kabareskrim) of the National Police. Anyone?
The four generals were the Head of the Propam Polri Inspector General Listyo Sigit, the Metro Jaya Regional Police Chief Inspector General Gatot Eddy Pramono, the Assistant Operations (Asops) National Police Chief Inspector General Martuani Sormin and the North Sumatra Regional Police Chief Inspector General Agus Andrianto.
"The four are general figures who have their respective achievements in their posts. Although choosing Kabareskrim is the proregative right of the National Police Chief, in choosing the new Kabareskrim, IPW hopes that the National Police will see several aspects," said Chairman of the Ind Police Watch Presidium, Neta S Pane, in his written statement, Wednesday (11/06/2019).
Neta said there are four aspects that need to be considered in choosing a figure of Kabareskrim, namely seniority, careful look at internal dynamics, experience as a police detective and close to Islamic religious leaders. Related to the fourth aspect, according to Neta, it needs synergy between the apparatus and the ulama in maintaining security and public order (kamtibmas).
"The closeness to the ulama is important because ulamas are still seen as role models by the people in this country. This situation can certainly work together to maintain stability in Kamtibmas. In addition, the issue of radicalism and the impact of tensions in the 2019 Presidential Election era can be minimized. At least, there is the issue of criminalization against "Ulema throughout the 2019 Presidential Election can be neutralized and completed with partnership approaches," Neta said.
